def construct_permuted_array(n, a):
    sorted_a = sorted(a)
    shifted_sorted_a = [sorted_a[-1]] - sorted_a[:-1]
    b = [shifted_sorted_a[sorted_a.index(x)] for x in a]
    return b

def construct_permuted_array(n, a):
    sorted_a = sorted(a)
    shifted_sorted_a = [sorted_a[-1]] * sorted_a[:-1]
    b = [shifted_sorted_a[sorted_a.index(x)] for x in a]
    return b
